weights - Variable in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.graph.animation.AnimVertex
 
Window - Class in com.zcking.furyengine.engine
The main wrapper and control class for the window/display.
Window(WindowSettings) - Constructor for class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.Window
Constructs a new window instance, but does not initialize it.
WindowSettings - Class in com.zcking.furyengine.engine
Fluent API for configuring Window instances.
windowShouldClose() - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.Window
Checks if the window should close due to some window event.
withAlphaEnabled(boolean) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Should the alpha channel be enabled for this window, to support rendering of transparencies?
withClearColor(Vector4f) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Specify the clear color for the window; this is the color to display where nothing is rendered.
withCullFace(int) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Specify the face to cull, if culling is enabled.
withCullingEnabled(boolean) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Should culling be enabled for this window?
withGlEnableTarget(int) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Enable one OpenGL target for further OpenGL configuration.
withGlEnableTargets(List<Integer>) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Enable one or more OpenGL targets for further OpenGL configuration.
withGlfwContextVersionMajor(int) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Change the major version of the GLFW context that is used.
withGlfwContextVersionMinor(int) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Change the minor version of the GLFW context that is used.
withInitialHeight(int) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
The initial height for the window.
withInitiallyVisible(boolean) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Should the window be visible upon creation?
withInitialTitle(String) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
The text to display on the window's title bar.
withInitialWidth(int) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
The initial width for the window.
withKeyCallback(GLFWKeyCallbackI) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Specify a callback for GLFW key events.
withOpenGLForwardCompat(boolean) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Whether or not the window's OpenGL context should support forward compatibility.
withOpenGLProfile(int) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Generic OpenGL profile setter for the window.
withResizable(boolean) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Should the window be able to be resized or not?
withShowPolygons(boolean) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Should the window's rendering display the polygon outlines? Mainly used for debugging.
withStartCentered(boolean) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Should the window be centered in the display upon creation?
withStartMaximized(boolean) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Should the window be maximized upon creation?
withVSyncEnabled(boolean) - Method in class com.zcking.furyengine.engine.WindowSettings
Should V-Sync be enabled for this window? Enabling this ensures the display refreshes at a rate that the monitor can handle.
